Please download the trial version for the iPhone emulator from here: 
http://www.electricplum.com/studio.aspx

once installed, go to VS IDE, click on the down arrow next to the 'Start' button, 
select 'Browse with...'
click 'Add'
browse to the exe file in the c:\ProgramFiles(x86)\electricplum folder where the exe is saved and select it
click 'ok', then click 'Browse'

Run this site with Chrome to see a different message being displayed for a desktop browser.
